```{python}
# | echo: false
# | height: 80px
from ipyleaflet import (
    Map,
    Marker,
    basemaps,
    basemap_to_tiles,
)
from ipywidgets import Layout

m = Map(
    basemap=basemap_to_tiles(basemaps.OpenStreetMap.Mapnik),
    center=(47.169722472687916, -122.60208720946943),
    zoom=12,
    layout=Layout(width="100%", height="160px"),
)
marker = Marker(
    location=(47.169722472687916, -122.60208720946943),
    draggable=False,
    title="Steilacoon, WA",
)
m.add_layer(marker)
m
```
